title: ICE on OSX compiling rust-crypto (non-release)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Reproducable with nightly and stable.

Versions:

OSX Yosemite 10.10.5

```
notgay:rust-crypto user$ rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.32.0-nightly (6e9b84296 2018-11-10)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 6e9b84296223126a0a59bde63a0f97011bb7b0f5
commit-date: 2018-11-10
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.32.0-nightly
LLVM version: 8.0
notgay:rust-crypto user$ git log -1
commit cc1a5fde1ce957bd1a8a2e30169443cdb4780111 (HEAD -> master, origin/master, origin/HEAD)
Merge: e8b82d0 a55ee37
Author: DaGenix <palmercox@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed Sep 7 01:29:55 2016 -0400

    Merge pull request #368 from mirandadam/patch-1

    Added BLAKE2s, capitalized BLAKE2b in readme.md
notgay:rust-crypto user$
```

Command:

```
notgay:rust-crypto user$ rustc --crate-name crypto src/lib.rs --color always --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=73e187019801cfc7 -C extra-filename=-73e187019801cfc7 --out-dir /Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/deps -C incremental=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/incremental -L dependency=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/deps --extern libc=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/deps/liblibc-e1d6654fa376e346.rlib --extern rand=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/deps/librand-b34d29f87e1ebcfc.rlib --extern rustc_serialize=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/deps/librustc_serialize-60a8fbf1dadd9453.rlib --extern time=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/deps/libtime-fc5eb27e731c74bd.rlib -L native=/Users/user/wrk/rust-crypto/target/debug/build/rust-crypto-d36473b08ea31766/out -l static=_rust_crypto_helpers
###
### A bunch of warning messages
###
thread 'main' has overflowed its stack
fatal runtime error: stack overflow
Abort trap: 6
notgay:rust-crypto user$
```

LLDB backtrace:

```
[snip] infinite recursion here

    frame #4020: 0x000000010cf17d47 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`rustc_data_structures::graph::iterate::post_order_walk::h2f49592cd957ef71 (.llvm.8125914428914332549) + 215

```
